address.description: Ethereum address to send the data to.

functionID.description: Ethereum function ID to send the data to.

data.description: Hexadecimal value to be sent in. This value is used as a fallback if no input value is passed in from the adapter pipeline.

amount.description: Amount of Ether to send to the contract along with the data.

value.description: Hexadecimal value that will be sent in to the Ethereum contract. Requires the value already be formatted as hex.
The input value passed in as hexadecimal.

txid.description: ID of the transaction that was written into Ethereum to create the update.
